32.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
32.title: Amazing Agent Luna
32.author: art by Shiei ; story by Nunzio DeFilippis & Christina Weir.
32.genre: Spy, science fiction and romance genres.
notes: "Reads from right to left, Japanese style."

Summary (from SkyRiver): Fifteen-year-old Luna was genetically engineered in a lab and trained to be the perfect secret agent. Now, Luna is sent to high school to spy on Count Von Brucken, her arch nemesis. But her training didn't include how to deal with the emotions she'll feel as she makes friends and rivals, and develops her first crush.

41.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
41.title: Angel
41.author: by Erica Sakurazawa.
notes: "Translator, Yuki Nakamura ; English adaptation, Lori Millican."

"When Kato picks up a beautiful girl at a bar one night, he's shocked to learn that she's an angel who can make all his dreams come true. But Kato isn't the only recipient of her heavenly blessings. Angel explores what happens whan an extraordinary angel transforms the ordinary lives of four people. They will never be the same! Erica Sakurazawa reveals what happens when real people are touched by an angel."

43.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
43.title: Angel Nest
43.author: by Erica Sakurazawa.
notes: "Translator, Yuki Nakamura ; English adaptation, Lori Millican."

"Natsu finds her husband with another woman when she comes home early from work one day. When he asks her for a divorce, Natsu doesn't really feel sad for some strange reason. All she can think of is what she has learned from her relationship with Ken and how she can move forward. Angel Nest reveals what happens when an angel visits Natsu and her life takes on a whole new meaning. Erica Sakurazawa reveals what happens when real people are touched by an angel."

53.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
53.title: Autumn
53.author: Mark Crilley.
notes: "It's autumn, and Miki Yoshida's life is finally settling into a routine, She and Hiro are spending all their time together, and Miki couldn't be happier, There's just one problem. Hiro's breaking all the rules to be with Miki, and the more time they spend together, and the more they fall for each other the more there is at stake. With jealous Reika on the prowl, Miki knows they can't hide forever."

57.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
57.title: B.O.D.Y.
57.author: story and art by Ao Mimori ; English adaptation, Kelly Sue DeConnick ; translation, Joe Yamazaki ; editor, Annette Roman.
notes: Summary (from publisher's web site via SkyRiver): "Everyone thinks 16-year-old Ryoko has weird taste in guys because she can't stop drooling over Ryu, the strong silent type who sits next to her in class. When she discovers he works for a host club
where women actually pay men to date them
will she finally wise up? Only one thing's for sure in B.O.D.Y.
you can't put a price on love!"

60.title: Be-Rabu = Be Love.

61.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
61.title: Beauty Pop
61.author: story and art by Kiyoko Arai ; English adaptation, Amanda Hubbard ; translation, Miho Nishida.
notes: "Although a truly gifted hairstylist, Kiri Koshiba has no interest in using her talent to pursue fame and fortune, unlike the three popular boys in the "Scissors Project" at school. Determined to become the best makeover team in Japan, they give showy makeovers to handpicked girls. As much as Kiri tries to shy away from the Scissors Project spotlight, she finds herself responding to beauty's call. When Kiri's friend Kanako gives a present to one of the members of the Scissors Project, her act of kindness is interpreted as a bribe to get a makeover, and they reject her for being too ugly. Kiri decides to help Kanako and give the boys a lesson in what true beauty is."

106.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
106.title: Captive Hearts
106.author: story & art by Matsuri Hino ; translation & adaptation, Andria Cheng ; touch-up art & lettering, Sabrina Heep.
notes: "Carefree Megumi Kuroishi was living a life of luxury until the day a girl named Suzuka Kogami walked into his life. All of a sudden, Meguni finds himself kneeling at Suzuka's feet and prostrating himself like a servant! What Megumi doesn't know (until that very moment anyway) is that his family is cursed to follow the orders of the Kogami family. Being carried around everywhere and having handsome Megumi act like a slave may seem ideal, but Suzuka just wishes he would stop. Can anything be done about Megumi's captive state? Or is Megumi doomed to see Suzuka as his master forever?"

148.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
148.title: The Color of Earth
148.author: Kim Dong Hwa ; translation from the Korean by Lauren Na ; afterword by Hwang Min-Ho ; afterword translation by Alexis Siegel.
notes: (The Story of Life on the Golden Fields ; v. 1)
Summary (from SkyRiver): A young girl, growing up with her mother who owns a tavern, learns about life through village gossip, travelers and many questions.

149.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
149.title: The Color of Heaven
149.author: Kim Dong Hwa ; translated from the Korean by Lauren Na.
notes: (The Story of Life on the Golden Fields ; v. 3)

Summary (from publisher's website via SkyRiver): "A celebration of the triumph of true love. As Ehwa grew from a girl to a young woman in The Color of Earth and The Color of Water, she began to understand and experience love and relationships, with her mother as a model and confidante. Now, in the heartwarming conclusion to this lyrically written and delicately drawn trilogy, Ehwa's true love comes at last, and as her mother looks on, she takes the final steps towards becoming an adult."

150.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
150.title: The Color of Water
150.author: Kim Dong Hwa ; translated from the Korean by Lauren Na.

contents.title: March winds and April showers bring May flowers
One hundred different flower bloom within a woman
The wind that calls out to a woman
Flower inside the fence, butterfly outside the fence

notes: (The Story of Life on the Golden Fields ; v. 2)

Summary (from publisher website via SkyRiver): "When Ehwa goes to the town festival, she meets a handsome young wrestler named Duksam who's eager to catch her eye. After he wins the festival wrestling championship, he and Ehwa begin to meet, sneaking spare moments to be together. But a shadow falls on their romance when Master Cho sends Duksam away and asks for Ehwa's hand in marriage himself. It is then that Ehwa discovers the pain of heartbreak
and that love is always complicated."

195.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
195.title: Deep Love : Ayu no Monogatari = Dîpu Rabu : Ayu no Monogatari
195.author: Yoshi ; Yoshî Yû.
notes: Romance genre, with drug abuse and prostitution.

197.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
197.title: Delivery Cupid
197.author: by CJ Michalski.
notes: "Tsubasa is half human, half angel. Determined to become a full angel, he needs to earn love points match-making as a cupid. He's been failing until now, but his big chance arrives: He is given a mission with the lowest rank that should be easy to complete. But problems arise when he goes to see his target, an evil man named Norimasa who uses women for money. Although Tsubasa is able to shoot an arrow at Norimasa, he accidentally pokes himself with the other arrow. Both Tsubasa and Norimasa develop feelings for each other, but is it because of cupid magic, or is it true love? Five other stories by master BL story-teller CJ Michalski are included."

201.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
201.title: Diary Loves.

204.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
204.title: Dr. Anthony King Hollywood Love Doctor.

206.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
206.title: Don't Say Any More, Darling
206.author: Fumi Yoshinaga.
notes: "The only thing keeping Tadashi, a struggling song lyricist, alive is food handouts from Kouhei, a successful doctor. In fact, Tadashi has been leeching off of Kouhei for practically their entire professional lives. Before they arrived at this queer living arrangement, they once enjoyed a little fling back when they were in high school. Though the affair ended briefly afterwards, they've remained fast friends still. But Kouhei's parents want nothing more than to see their son settling down. As Kouhei is pushed ever more forcefully into an arranged marriage, will he finally admit that he sees Tadashi as something more than just a friend?"

209.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
209.title: Dramacon
209.author: created by Svetlana Chmakova.
notes: "Christie is an amateur writer who shows up at her first anime convention with her artist boyfriend, ready to promote the manga they created together. But when she unexpectedly falls for a mysterious cosplayer, things get a little, well, complicated. What do you do when the person you're falling in love with is going to be miles away in just a matter of days?"

228.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
228.title: Fall in Love like a Comic
228.author: story & art by Chitose Yagami ; translation & adaptation, Mai Ihara.
notes: Summary (from OCLC): Rena Sakura is a high school student with a secret: she's a professional mangaka. And although she's never been on a date, that doesn't stop her from drawing steamy shojo scenes for a popular magazine. But when the gorgeous Tomoya Okita finds out her secret, she finds herself asking him out to get some real-life experience in love!

232.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.

232.author: Okano Reiko.
notes: Summary (from OCLC): A story about Yôhei, a university student in Tokyo. As his father runs a temple in the country, he may succeed in his position as a monk. However, he is reluctant to be trained in a monastery, because he cannot see his girlfriend once he is put in training.

235.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
235.title: Festering Romance
235.author: Renee Lott.
notes: Summary (from SkyRiver): Janet happily spends her free time in college playing video games with the ghost of her best friend, Paul, but her living friends have other ideas and begin to set Janet up on a series of blind dates with the hope she will discover romance.

246.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
246.title: Flower in a Storm
246.author: story & art by Shigeyoshi Takagi.
notes: "Riko Kunimi is trying to lead a normal high school life when Ran Tachibana bursts into her classroom carrying a gun and tells her that her life is now his. Ran, the richest, most powerful 17-year-old in Japan wants her as his wife, and he's not taking no for an answer! If Ran can't capture her by five o'clock the next day, he'll give up on her, but he has all that money can buy at his disposal. However, Riko has one trick up her sleeve

251.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
251.title: Forest of Gray City
251.author: Uhm JungHyun ; translation, HyeYoung Im ; English adaptation, J
notes: Vol. 2 published: New York, N.Y. : Yen Press.
"First published in Korea in 2005 by Seoul Cultural Publishers."

"Yun-Ook Jang is a freelance illustrator who rents out a room to help pay off her debts. Her tenant is a drop out named Bum-Moo Lee who only has a part-time job. Before Yun-Ook knew how old Bum-Moo was, he seemed rather mysterious and cold to her, and the two argued all the time. But what? He's only 17? That's just a kid who should be going to school! Then one day, Bum-Moo asks her a most dangerous question: Do you mind if I like you?"

254.title: Foto Romances.

257.heading: ROMANCE COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
257.title: Four-Eyed Prince
257.author: Wataru Mizukami ; translated and adapted by Jamie Jacobs ; lettered by North Market Street Graphics.
notes: "Secret crush. Sachiko is wildly attracted to the quiet, cool Akihiko, the 'four-eyed prince.' But now they've become siblings by marriage
and must live under the same roof, as brother and sister! And if that isn't bad enough, it turns out that Ahihiko is hiding a surprise behind those nerdy glasses."
